data.prayer: Father, show your mercy on the 13,389 people in Eastern who are far from you. Please add 3 new house churches this year.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Eastern, American Samoa
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, let the threatened of Eastern, American Samoa know that it is better to trust in you than to trust in humans.
data.verse: It is better to take refuge in the Lord than to trust in humans.

data.prayer: Spirit, give the disciples of the the state of Eastern words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

data.prayer: Lord, help the people of Eastern, American Samoa to discover the essence of being a disciple, making disciples, and how to plant churches that multiply.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Aūa
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Aūa, Eastern, American Samoa.
Father, for all those you call to look after your flock from the 4,411 believers in Eastern, please, make them passionate about hearing your Word.
data.verse: Therefore, you shepherds, hear the word of the LORD.

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Eastern, American Samoa. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.

data.section_summary:
the state of Eastern, American Samoa has a population of 17,800.

We estimate Eastern has 4,411 people who might know Jesus, 12,574 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 815 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 4 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, give the believers of the the state of Eastern unity and humility as they work to bring the kingdom to new people and places.

location.name: Eastern
location.cities_list: Pago Pago, Aūa, Fagatogo, Utulei, Leloaloa
location.cities_list_w_pop: Pago Pago (11,500), Aūa (2,124), Fagatogo (1,868), Utulei (683), Leloaloa (546)
